title.rendered: JW Marriott, Renaissance, and Courtyard Santo Domingo Invite Travelers to Escape to this Capital City

content.rendered:
Uncover personalized experiences, culinary delights, and an urban retreat of properties nestled in the bustling capital of Dominican Republic

SANTO DOMINGO, Dominican Republic, May 15, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — As travelers look to explore new cities and destinations across the Caribbean, Marriott International properties invite seasoned and new travelers to experience La Capital – a modern and dynamic metropolis in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic.  Featuring cobblestoned streets and buildings that date back to the 1500s, travelers can immerse themselves in the pulse of Dominican culture, where the old and the new converge seamlessly.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/jw-marriott-renaissance-and-courtyard-santo-domingo-invite-travelers-to-escape-to-this-capital-city-302146396.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
